title: Evidence-Based Instructional Strategies Workshop for Students with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy knowledge and general understanding of learning disabilities
context.additional_context: A practical, digital device-enabled interactive course for office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to establish personalized strategies by analyzing cognitive and academic characteristics of students with learning disabilities.
Learners apply evidence-based instructional strategies (strategy instruction, explicit instruction, gradual release of responsibility) to actual lesson designs.
Learners measure the effectiveness of strategy instruction through formative assessments and derive improvement plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
